entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow over higher terrain early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
